tspsolver.ga.test.population_generation_test.find_unique_rows(matrix)[source]¶

Find all of the unique rows in a matrix

Code modified from: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/16970982/find-unique-rows-in-numpy-array

Parameters:matrix – matrix which may contain identical rows
Returns:matrix with identical rows removed.
Return type:ndarray
